org.datavec.nlp.vectorizer

Class TextVectorizer<VECTOR_TYPE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.datavec.nlp.vectorizer.TextVectorizer<VECTOR_TYPE>

    AbstractTfidfVectorizer

    public abstract class TextVectorizer<VECTOR_TYPE>
extends java.lang.Object
implements Vectorizer<VECTOR_TYPE>
    Baseline text vectorizer that includes some common elements to text analysis such as the tokenizer factory
